intent_atoms.description: Synthetic edit list fixtures must be regenerated for empty, single-offset, multi-segment, and rate-adjusted scenarios to ensure VR-014 diagnostics surface across representative payloads.
Expand the fixture catalog metadata, regression tests, and JSON export snapshots to cover new assets and verify rule messaging.
Updated repository documentation must mark C14d complete and point follow-on efforts toward pending metadata parser work.
Proceed with C15 metadata container coverage and Validation Rule #15 chunk/sample correlation per existing planning documents.

functional_units.name: Generate Synthetic Edit List Fixtures
functional_units.description: Creates synthetic edit list fixtures for various scenarios such as empty, single-offset, multi-segment, and rate-adjusted using generate_fixtures.py

functional_units.name: Export JSON Snapshots of Edit Lists
functional_units.description: Exports JSON representations of edit lists to verify rule messaging and snapshot consistency

functional_units.name: Run Validation Tests for Edit List Scenarios
functional_units.description: Executes Swift test cases filtered by specific edit list snapshot tests (empty, single-offset, multi-segment, rate-adjusted) and overall test suite
